name: ethereum-parallel-fetcher
description: Parallel event fetching library for Ethereum contracts

scripts.release: npm test && npm run clean && standard-version && ./publish.sh
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run clean && standard-version --release-as patch && ./publish.sh
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm run clean && standard-version --release-as minor && ./publish.sh
scripts.release:major: npm test && npm run clean && standard-version --release-as major && ./publish.sh
scripts.release:first: npm test && npm run clean && standard-version --first-release && ./publish.sh
